subject: Re: [junit] Help me
msgSnippet: ... TestCase.name() is a method from JUnit 3.7 or before. Somewhere on your classpath is an old version of JUnit. Run your ant buildfile in debug and verbose
messageBody:
Sadaf_Choudhry wrote:

> Hi,
>
> I get this really starnge behaviour
> I am working with ant 1.5.3 and junit 3.8...
>
> my tests run ok, but whenever I add weblogic.jar (which i need for some
> tests) to my classpath, i get the following error:
>
> [junit] Running UsesNewJar
> [junit] java.lang.NoSuchMethodError:
> junit.framework.TestCase.name()Ljava/lang/String;

TestCase.name() is a method from JUnit 3.7 or before. Somewhere on your
classpath is an old version of JUnit.

Run your ant buildfile in debug and verbose modes and be sure what's on
your classpath and from where it's coming. There is a chance that
WebLogic shipped something that contains an older version of JUnit.

Good luck.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
